alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Grant; Hooker; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 9:43PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Arthur, southern Grant, southwestern Hooker and west central McPherson Counties through 1030 PM CDT/930 PM MDT/... At 942 PM CDT/842 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Swan Lake, or 14 miles north of Arthur, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arthur, Swan Lake, Haythorn Lake, Lena, Sand Puddin Lake, Cogill Lake, McKeag, Calora, Jensen Lake, Green Lake, Three Mile Lake, Velma, Pratt Lake, Spring Valley Lake, Bucktail and Sand Beach Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 116 and 152. Highway 92 between mile markers 165 and 182. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
